data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Irkutsk that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Irkutsk, Russia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Irkutsk, Russia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, convict the 35,544 believers in Irkutsk to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Irkutsk, Russia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Kazakh people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,030,014, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Irkutsk, Russia.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.section_summary:
the state of Irkutsk, Russia has a population of 2,428,800.

We estimate Irkutsk has 35,544 people who might know Jesus, 1,363,242 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,030,014 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Irkutsk against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.
